experience.title: Business Analyst
experience.description: - Led the sales cycle for 50+ clients across different industries globally, worked on RFPs, proposals- Part of team instrumental in incubating & expanding organization’s operations in 2 new regions- Part of team that established the Inside Sales and Sales Enablement practice- Received 3 awards in Quarterly Rewards Program for quality of work, consistency and attention to detail

honors_and_awards.description: Strong commitment towards excellence, ability to capitalize opportunities, learn, deliver and strive to achieve exceptional growth in a short span with Quantiphi, would best describe the winner of the Rising Star Award. The young achiever has gone beyond the call of duty to make a distinct impact.
